Industrial Organization : Pickup Truck Market Analysis

During Spring semester of my Sophomore year, I took Prof. Jun Ishii's Industrial Organization class. For the final paper, I did a group project with two of my classmates. Our project analyzed the sales of traditional pickup trucksin the US and how unibody trucks are emerging as potent competitors. Here is a link to the paper:
Link to our Analysis

Development Economics : Dream Project

During spring semester of my Freshmen year, I took Development Economics with Prof. Prakarsh Singh. I worked with a team comprising of 4 students throughout the semester to come up with an Experiment to be conducted in India. The experiment would create self help groups(SHGs) of women and study its "potential role on child health by analyzing the effect of combining women's empowerment and child nutrition programs."(Cited from the conculsion of the paper). Alexa Russo, one of our group members kept on working with Prof. Singh on the project after the class had ended and the final paper was published on Social Science Research Network. Below is the link to SSRN's page.
Paper Published on SSRN
